EMAIL_BODY_NEW_ORDER: A new order (#%ORDER_NUMBER%) has been placed
EMAIL_BODY_ORDER_CONFIRMATION: لقد تلقينا طلبك وسنتصل بك بمجرد شحن الطرد الخاص بك.
VERIFICATION_SUBJECT: يرجى التحقق من بريدك الإلكتروني لـ %appname%
VERIFICATION_BODY:
Hi,

You are being asked to confirm the e-mail address %email% with %appname%

Click here to confirm it:
%link%
PASSWORD_RESET_SUBJECT: طلب إعادة تعيين كلمة المرور لـ appname
PASSWORD_RESET_BODY:
Hi,

You requested a password reset for %appname%.

Click here to reset it:
%link%
BODY_PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: لقد تم تحديث كلمة السر الخاصة بك بنجاح.
BODY_INVALID_LINK: هناك خطأ ما. حاول مرة أخرى في وقت لاحق.
ERROR_PASSWORD_CONFIRM: تأكيد كلمة المرور لا يتطابق مع كلمة المرور
EMAIL_BODY_ORDER_IN_PROCESS: Your order # %ORDER_NUMBER% is now being processed. We'll notify you when your order is ready for shipment.
EMAIL_BODY_ORDER_PACKED: Your order # %ORDER_NUMBER% is ready for shipment. We'll notify you when your order is shipped out.
EMAIL_BODY_ORDER_SHIPPED_OUT: Great news. Your order # %ORDER_NUMBER% is on its way to you!
EMAIL_BODY_ORDER_DELIVERED: Good news. According to our records your order # %ORDER_NUMBER% was successfully delivered.
EMAIL_BODY_ORDER_CANCELLED: We're really sorry, but we've cancelled your order # %ORDER_NUMBER%. We apologize for any inconvenience.
